title: High country children of New Zealand
creator_credit: Yvonne MacKay, Dave Gibson and Gibson Film Productions
brief_description: Two children - Malcolm and Nerelli Prouting - live with their family on a sheep station in the isolated high country of south New Zealand. This film shows their daily lives from the excitement of mustering high up in the hills to mundane correspondence school work. Filmed on location at Mount Arrowsmith Station, New Zealand.
